profile.name: Ahmed Mohamed Lemine
profile.about: International Liberal Arts (Global Connectivity) student at Akita International University in Japan, with strong analytical, multilingual, and cross-cultural skills. Interested in the intersection of technology, AI, business, and society. Motivated to apply structured problem-solving and communication skills to projects that deliver measurable, human-focused impact.
